raw_data.caption: Raw Data
raw_data.description: The event data as received from the event source.

raw_score.caption: Reputation Score
raw_score.description: CVSS Score in the range of 0.0 to 10.0.

remediation_level_id.caption: Remediation Level (RL)
remediation_level_id.description: Name: Remediation Level (RL). Group: Temporal. CVSS version: v1, v2, v3

report_confidence_id.description: Name: Report Confidence (RC). Group: Temporal. CVSS version: v1, v2, v3

scope_id.caption: Scope (S)
scope_id.description: Name: Scope (S). Group: Base. CVSS version: v3

severity_id.caption: Qualitative Severity Rating
severity_id.description: The Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) Qualitative Severity Rating. A textual representation of the numeric score. None (0.0), Low (0.1 - 3.9), Medium (4.0 - 6.9), High (7.0 - 8.9), Critical (9.0 - 10.0)

-1.caption: Other
-1.description: The event severity is not mapped. See the severity attribute, which contains a data source specific value.

0.caption: None
0.description: The event severity is not known.

2.caption: Medium
2.description: The user decides if action is needed.

3.caption: High
3.description: Action is required but the situation is not serious at this time.

5.caption: Critical
5.description: Action is required immediately and the scope is broad.

6.caption: Fatal
6.description: An error occurred but it is too late to take remedial action.

target_distribution_id.caption: Target Distribution (TD)
target_distribution_id.description: Name: Target Distribution (TD). Group: Environmental. CVSS version: v1, v2

user_interaction_id.caption: User Interaction (UI)
user_interaction_id.description: The User Interaction Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) metric. Name: User Interaction (UI). Group: Base. CVSS version: v3
